channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Father of 5-year-old detained in Minnesota disputes government assertion he abandoned the boy
item.description: The father of a 5-year-old boy detained by immigration officers in Texas denies abandoning his son. Adrian Conejo Arias is originally from Ecuador.

item.title: A crisis emerges across the US as ‘forever chemicals’ quietly contaminate drinking water wells
‘Today’ show host Savannah Guthrie’s mother is missing in Arizona and authorities suspect crime
